text: This is now my favorite indian restaurant in town!  They have a very extensive menu for dinner.  We ordered the <Dum Chicken Biriyani>, <Bhagara Baigan>, and <Punu Gulu>.  It was amazing!  Everyone was incredibly nice as well.  I'm excited to try their <lunch buffet> and all the items on the menu that I have never seen before!

restaurant.name: Minerva Indian Cuisine
